name: Sugar Rush (itch) (Conflicter, aimbox)
description:
Protect:   Build:    Defeat: 

 

Play as a parent and protect your baby from terrible candy enemies!

  • Move around the map!
  • Build towers!
  • Shoot to attack the candies!
  • Throw boxes at them!
  • Protect your baby!

Defeating enemies gives you fittings that can be used to upgrade weapons and towers!

Go out there and protect your baby from some sugary fiends!

- This game is an assignment for a game design/game development class, made by game design/game development students, belonging to UCSC.
